MAIN_MESSAGE: The following information is for customers in the Airdrie area ONLY. It is necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 1pm due to an overhead fault at Yetts Hole and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 3pm. We will update messages with any additional information as quickly as we can.  We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience.  This message was updated at 10:10am     on 20th April 2021.
